languages.text: "Ах, {name}, ваше стремление похвально, и все же не забывайте — правителю не стоит преклонять голову перед свитой, иначе это могут счесть за проявление слабости".
"Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."
languages.original_text: "Ах, {name}, ваше стремление похвально, и все же не забывайте — правителю не стоит преклонять голову перед свитой, иначе это могут счесть за проявление слабости".

traits.locale_text: "Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."
"Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."
"Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."
"Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."
"Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."

languages.text: “嗯，{name}，尽管您的愿景非常高尚，但请不要忘记，统治者绝对不能向臣民鞠躬，否则有些人可能会把这当成软弱的表现。”
languages.original_text: "Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，{name}，尽管您的愿景非常高尚，但请不要忘记，统治者绝对不能向臣民鞠躬，否则有些人可能会把这当成软弱的表现。”

languages.text: «Vaya, {name}, es un deseo encomiable, pero no olvide que un gobernante nunca debe inclinarse ante sus subordinados. Alguien podría considerarlo una muestra de debilidad».
languages.original_text: "Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."

traits.locale_text: «Vaya, {name}, es un deseo encomiable, pero no olvide que un gobernante nunca debe inclinarse ante sus subordinados. Alguien podría considerarlo una muestra de debilidad».

languages.text: 「{name}様、御身のご希望は称賛に値しますが―支配者はいかなる時も従者に頭を下げてはなりません。弱さの表れと捉える者もいます」
languages.original_text: "Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}様、御身のご希望は称賛に値しますが―支配者はいかなる時も従者に頭を下げてはなりません。弱さの表れと捉える者もいます」

languages.text: "Nun, {name}, Euer Wunsch ist sehr lobenswert, aber bitte vergesst nicht – Herrscher sollten sich nie bei ihren Untertanen andienern, denn das kann leicht als Schwäche ausgelegt werden."
languages.original_text: "Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, {name}, Euer Wunsch ist sehr lobenswert, aber bitte vergesst nicht – Herrscher sollten sich nie bei ihren Untertanen andienern, denn das kann leicht als Schwäche ausgelegt werden."

languages.text: « Vos intentions sont tout à fait louables, {name}, mais n'oubliez pas qu'un souverain ne doit jamais plier l'échine devant ses sujets, au risque que certains prennent cela comme un signe de faiblesse. »
languages.original_text: "Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."

traits.locale_text: « Vos intentions sont tout à fait louables, {name}, mais n'oubliez pas qu'un souverain ne doit jamais plier l'échine devant ses sujets, au risque que certains prennent cela comme un signe de faiblesse. »

languages.text: "Pek değerli {name}, arzunuz son derece takdire şayan olsa da lütfen unutmayın... Hükümdar, altındakilere asla boyun eğmemelidir. Bazıları bunu zayıflık göstergesi olarak görebilir."
languages.original_text: "Why, {name}, your desire is most commendable, but please do not forget — a ruler should never bow to their attendants, or some might see it as a show of weakness."

traits.locale_text: "Pek değerli {name}, arzunuz son derece takdire şayan ancak lütfen unutmayın; bir hükümdar altındakilere asla boyun eğmemelidir, bazıları bunu zayıflık göstergesi olarak görebilir."
